title: Language Learning Design and Analysis Workshop for Iterative Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen language education design competencies and establish data-driven improvement cycles for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Participants Can Derive at Least Three Language Education Scenarios Using a Learning Design Pattern Language
Participants Can Collect and Analyze Curriculum Operation Data Using Learning Analytics Tools and Identify at Least One Improvement Point
Participants Can Collaborate with Peer Instructors to Finalize an Instructional Design Plan Applying an Iterative Improvement Cycle (Plan-Do-Check-Act)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
